ValidationRule.description: For the HCP Outreach Status only Integration user can change the fields status from anything to 'Fax Received'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator Full',$Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator'), ISCHANGED(HCP_Enrollment_Outreach__c), ISPICKVAL(HCP_Enrollment_Outreach__c, "Fax Received") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have access to update the action required to â€œFax Received'
